scripts.patch: npm version patch -m"update version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m"update version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major: npm version major -m"update version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version: auto-changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m'update change log' && git push
